actionable_quotes.quote: Nano Banana, Google's new image model, is the best image model to ever exist. It's what we all wanted out of an image model.

actionable_quotes.quote: It's basically like Photoshop, except you don't need to hire someone to go and edit. You just use plain language.
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the model's ease of use compared to traditional editing

actionable_quotes.quote: There's going to be a lot of people who make a lot of money from this specific model.
